summary: In this context, ethylbenzene is categorized as a volatile organic compound (VOC) and is mentioned alongside other organic chemicals like benzene and toluene. These compounds are highlighted due to their hazardous properties and their presence in industrial wastewaters, which necessitates effective treatment methods like bioremediation. Ethylbenzene's classification as an organic chemical underscores its relevance in discussions about environmental pollution and remediation strategies.
